txt.en: 'It is truly a prized decoration for this hall. All those who visit Vérnozal will know of our deeds and our great valour. You have done well and assisted the Zhélruka efforts in Gundabad a great deal. I thank you for your aid to our cause, [placeholder].'
'It is important to show everyone that they are safe in Gundabad, under the protection of the Zhélruka.'
'It is truly a prized decoration for this hall.'
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nYou should hang the head of Svalnath in Vérnozal.
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nPrince Ingór wishes to talk to you.
The monster commander in this mission will attempt to summon blizzards.
'It is important to show everyone that they are safe in Gundabad, under the protection of the Zhélruka. That is why I am coming with you to slay this beast. Let us be off!'
You have pledged to lend your aid and your adventuring skills to the Zhélruka and to fight on their behalf in Gundabad.
This is a mighty trophy for the Zhélruka

'[placeholder], I have a mission for you. There is a fearsome cold-drake named Svalnath who nests in Gundabad. This spawn of Hrímil Frost-heart threatens all dwarves who walk upon the Three Peaks. We must find the drake and kill it if our people and their neighbours are to be safe here in Gundabad.'
Hang the head of Svalnath in Vérnozal
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nPrince Ingór wishes to talk to you.
